title: "Assassins were nerfed hard this patch."
body:
No they weren't and I will tell you why.
Tiamat just got cheaper, meaning ad assassins can add an essential part of their burst for just 1250 gold.
Yoummu's ghostblade got turned into an assassin item, now it gives 65 ad.
The defensive mastery tree was nerfed early game, allowing assassins to do better versus tanks and bruisers.
ADC's became more popular, and assassins are the class meant to counter ADC's.
You assassin mains just want assassins to become op again.
